issue.title: visual and collision element with same name confuses gazebo visualization

content.raw:
this was due to the fact that the model has visual and collision with the same name, i.e. in chassis link:

      <collision name='collision'>
        <geometry>
          <box>
            <size>.4 .2 .1</size>
          </box>
        </geometry>
      </collision>

      <visual name='collision'>
        <geometry>
          <box>
            <size>.4 .2 .1</size>
          </box>
        </geometry>
      </visual>

upon choosing a correct unique name, the error went away.

Probably should have a check for duplicate names between different types of Entiteis (e.g. collisions and visuals).  Will rename this ticket accordingly.
content.html:
this was due to the fact that the model has visual and collision with the same name, i.e. in chassis link:

  <collision name='collision'>
    <geometry>
      <box>
        <size>.4 .2 .1</size>
      </box>
    </geometry>
  </collision>

  <visual name='collision'>
    <geometry>
      <box>
        <size>.4 .2 .1</size>
      </box>
    </geometry>
  </visual>

upon choosing a correct unique name, the error went away.

Probably should have a check for duplicate names between different types of Entiteis (e.g. collisions and visuals). Will rename this ticket accordingly.
